name: Billy Bluenose: Battle of The Atlantic
name_original: Billy Bluenose: Battle of The Atlantic
description:
ALIENS ARE INVADING HALIFAX!! AND THEY’RE AFTER ONE THING.... The Bluenose?

“NOW’S NOT THE TIME FOR QUESTIONS! WE CAN’T LOSE ONE OF OUR PROVINCIAL TREASURES!” That was the thought process of young Billy Bluenose after one of the alien’s absentmindedly drops one of their laser-guns. Now, as Billy, you must defend your city and your namesake from the incoming invasion. The weapon is finicky though, and will unleash a deadly blast if you’re firing recklessly. Aim for the aliens and their mothership while avoiding as much collateral damage as possible! You have a great power in your hands, and now you have a responsibility to defend your home...while simultaneously trying not destroy it.

Instructions

 - Kill the mothership without dying, and while minimizing collateral damage to the city

- WASD/Arrow keys to move

- Space to jump

- Mouse + left button to shoot
